channel.title: Npc Spawning
channel.description:
i have the npc spawning command in my server 'delta [317]' but i want to add a seperate command like a "jad" command for example. but how could i make it so i type 'jad' and only jad will spawn so i do not have to add the npc ids, etc. , thanks for reading hope you can help.
ps: can't seem to find anything on google :L
thanks again.

item.title: Npc Spawning
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“woffelz, post:1, topic:402228”]i have the npc spawning command in my server ‘delta [317]’ but i want to add a seperate command like a “jad” command for example. but how could i make it so i type ‘jad’ and only jad will spawn so i do not have to add the npc ids, etc. , thanks for reading hope you can help.

ps: can’t seem to find anything on google :L

thanks again.[/quote]

The same way you would the npc command, but instead of reading an Npc id, default to the jad id.

Read full topic
